person.persName: Samuel Wells (Shreveport, Louisiana, attorney, mayor, and commissioner of deeds)

body.p: Shreveport, Louisiana, attorney, mayor, and commissioner of deeds. Alabama native. District attorney in Shreveport in 1860. Mayor of Shreveport from May 1864 to October 1864. Commissioner of Deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Louisiana in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Louisiana, Caddo Parish, Shreveport, p. 99.; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Louisiana, Caddo Parish, Shreveport, p. 55; "Shreveport's Mayors," The Times (Shreveport, La.), April 30, 1967, p. 1.
